items.content_html: This is a test with an enclosed .jpeg image. I wasn’t aware of the fact that micro.blog only includes JPEGs for the photos page to help filter out screenshots which are usually PNGs.
items.content_text: This is a test with an enclosed .jpeg image. I wasn't aware of the fact that micro.blog only includes [JPEGs](https://help.micro.blog/t/photo-pages/80) for the photos page to help filter out screenshots which are usually PNGs.
